name: On The Road (itch)
description:
An Arcade Game, you need to drive as long as you can with your car ON THE ROAD, feel the power of drifting and the speed, you need to control this uncontrollable speed to stay on the road. this game made with Game Maker Studio : Professional.

Comment or Donate if you like the game or maybe make me  , and give me some feedback to keep me develop this game :D

VERSION 2!!
TRY TO REACH 300M DRIFTING!!

Controls :

A & D = Left and Right
Click to Play
